```py
epsilon_start = 1.0
epsilon_final = 0.01
epsilon_decay = 30000

epsilon_by_episode = lambda episode: epsilon_final + (epsilon_start - epsilon_final) * math.exp(-1\. * episode / epsilon_decay)

plt.plot([epsilon_by_episode(i) for i in range(1000000)])
plt.show()
```
